title: The Winner
description: Camille Reed is a single mother to a beautiful teen-aged daughter. She has a dead end job, no education, and no hope that her life will ever get better... until she buys two lottery tickets in her small town in West Virginia. And she wins more money than she can imagine. She ends up in New York City. She meets the perfect guy with influential friends. He's rich, good looking, and genuinely cares about her and her daughter. But her past, and his secrets, prevent her from falling in love with him. Can she overcome her demons and give herself to a man who is much more than he appears? Read "The Winner" and find out... What would you do if you won the biggest jackpot ever?This is a mature book intended for adults.
author: Melissa Silvey
